attributes.action: Allow the use of so called illegal downloading on files or force companys to cut prices of their products
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain is a rip off nation when it comes to the consumer product market. so its no surprise that people download files illegally (which is illegal only to the big record companys and movie makers when they are losing money). to stop this would be a crime in it self and destroys freedom of speech. There is a reason why 6 million people do it. So lets stp the policing of the internet and live in freedom

rejection.details: No such proposals have been put forward.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
